article_title: Trump Immigration Plan Has Been Promised for 30 Years
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: jeff sessions, donald trump, immigration, policy

og.description: Alabama Sen. Jeff Sessions, who helped GOP presidential front-runner Donald Trump craft his immigration policy, says much of the plan would simply involve enforcing existing laws. The rest would be demanded by the public.
